page.title: 13A Typical Day in My Life
page.content: I get out of bed at seven thirty every morning except in the holidays.After washing and dressing I go downstairs and have my breakfast.I sometimes help my mum with the washing up,do my teeth,get my bag ready,fetch my jacket and walk to school.I arrive there at about ten to nine,then when the bell rings I line up ready to go into class.After the register is called we usually start with Maths,which I like. Sometimes we have a test after play or we do English,which is my favourite.We have a playtime before our lunch,which is at quarter to one.I like having salad.Then there is just time for a quick game of football before the bell goes at twenty-five past one for afternoon school.The afternoon means more fun and less hard work!Most of us prefer this,guess why?
